job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: strongWho We Are brbrstrongFounded in 2020 by former members of the Essential Products team in Silicon Valley OSOM is a hardwaresoftware technology startup that prioritizes privacy OSOM pronounced awesome stands for Out of Sight Out of Mind As our mission states we are creating products that give people access to the world without giving the world access to them We are in stealth mode now but excited to introduce a future where our users decide how and when to share their personal informationbrbrAt OSOM we believe privacy is a right not a luxury or a privilege We want to enable every individual to own their privacy We are looking for passionate people to help us build this futurebrbrstrong Read More About OSOM Here  are looking for a Junior Software Engineer to design develop and test OSOM softwarebrbrstrong What Youll Do brstrongulliImplement nicetohave P1P2 featuresliliImplement new userfacing and custom features with support from Senior and Lead EngineersliliResearch leading and future technologies to integrate into OSOMs product roadmapliulWhat Were Looking Forbrulli12 years of professional software development or relevant project or design experienceliliUS applicants must be authorized to work in the USliulHow Youll Stand OutbrulliRequire little direction to complete tasksliliBe creative proactive informed datadriven and resourcefulliliProven track record of completing projects tasks with supporting metricsliulPerks Youll ReceivebrulliMedical Dental Vision and Life InsuranceliliMaternity Paternity amp Adoption LeaveliliFlexible Paid Time Off amp Holidays Including a Winter Shut DownliliWork from Home StipendbrliulAt OSOM we are committed to providing an environment fundamentally built on mutual respect where employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees without regard to race color religion sex pregnancy nationality age disability marital status sexual orientation gender identity gender expression genetic information including characteristics and testing military service and veteran status and any other characteristic protected by applicable law OSOM believes that diversity and inclusion among our team is critical to our success as a companybrbrOSOM is requiring all employees to be vaccinated against COVID19 unless the employee has a medical or religious reason not to be vaccinatedbrbrIf you need any accommodations or assistance with applying for a position please email us at recruitingosomprivacycom
